citation.article-title: Deinococcus aerolatus sp. nov. and Deinococcus aerophilus sp. nov., isolated from air samples
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Description of Deinococcus aerolatus sp. nov.
Deinococcus aerolatus (ae.ro.la′tus. Gr. n. aer air; L. masc. part. adj. latus carried; N.L. masc. part. adj. aerolatus airborne).
Cells are Gram-positive, non-motile, aerobic cocci (1.2–1.7 μm).
Colonies are pink, convex and circular with entire margins.
Growth occurs in the presence of 0–1 % (w/v) NaCl (optimum, 0 %), at pH 7–9 (optimum, pH 7) and at 5–40 °C (optimum, 30 °C).
Hydrolyses casein, hypoxanthine, Tween 80 and xanthine, but does not hydrolyse chitin, CM-cellulose, DNA, pectin, starch or tyrosine.
Positive reactions for aesculin hydrolysis, gelatin hydrolysis and β-galactosidase.
Negative reactions for nitrate reduction, indole production, glucose fermentation, arginine dihydrolase and urease (API 20NE).
Assimilates d-glucose, d-mannose, d-mannitol, maltose, potassium gluconate, adipic acid, sucrose, salicin, melibiose, d-sorbitol, valeric acid, potassium 2-ketogluconate and l-proline.

Weakly assimilates l-serine and l-histidine; does not assimilate l-arabinose, N-acetylglucosamine, capric acid, malic acid, trisodium citrate, phenylacetic acid, l-rhamnose, d-ribose, inositol, itaconic acid, suberic acid, sodium malonate, sodium acetate, lactic acid, l-alanine, potassium 5-ketogluconate, glycogen, 3-hydroxybenzoic acid, l-fucose, propionic acid, 3-hydroxybutyric acid or 4-hydroxybenzoic acid (API 20NE and API ID32 GN).
Enzymic activities are shown in Table 1.
MK-8 is the predominant isoprenoid quinone.
The polar lipids consist of one phospholipid, several polar lipids and two aminophospholipids.
The major fatty acids are summed feature 3 (iso-C15 : 0 2-OH and/or C16 : 1ω7c), C16 : 0 and iso-C17 : 1ω9c.
The type strain, 5516T-9T (=KACC 12745T=JCM 15442T), was isolated from an air sample from Taean region, Korea.
The G+C content of the genomic DNA of the type strain is 61.0 mol%.
